snippet: Ed Lucas, who lost his sight at age 12 in a sports injury, became a regular fixture in big-league clubhouses and dugouts and a reporter for The Jersey Journal.
abstract: Memoir Seeing Home: The Ed Lucas Story, written by Lucas with his son Christopher, tells story of his life as blind sports journalist whose baseball dispatches have been running in The Jersey Journal since 1977; book is published by Jeter Publishing, owned by the former Yankee player Derek Jeter (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
